basic_info.description: Hello, my name is Marta Deneke, I am originally from Ethiopia. I received my bachelor's in MIS in 2020. Since, the pandemic had just started right before my graduation I had a difficult time finding a job. Which is when I started to look into becoming a Software Engineer and researched diffedrent boot camps. Then, I joined Code Fellows in November. While attending Western Washington Universityy, I worked and volunteered at various companies in order to find my true passion. As a first generation college graduate I have faced different challeneges to be where i am today and once I land my dream job and become a Software Engineer I would like to start a nonprofit in Ethiopia for young women that are intrested in Tech but don't know where to start.

projects.title: City Explorer
projects.description: Created a site that displays the map, weather data and the movie data of a city that the user enters.Used different APIs as well as React as well Bootstrap.

projects.title: Can of Books
projects.description: Created an app using React that displays different books to the user and allows them add and remove books.Used Node.js, React, MongoDB & Bootstrap

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: Built a site that displays different images of horned beasts with a description of each animal. The user has the ability to click on the image and like their most favorite beasts.
